subject: Re: [junit] Starter
msgSnippet: Hi I thought JUnit comes with some examples on Vector Unit testing ? And the infamous Money Test problem ? Most of the time, I asked new comers who don t know
messageBody:
Hi

I thought JUnit comes with some examples on Vector Unit testing ?
And the infamous Money Test problem ?

Most of the time, I asked new comers who don't know anything
on JUnit, to read up the article regarding the Money Test.

At one sitting, and when they finish up reading and implementing,
they usually have a pretty good understanding about JUnit.

Regards
==========
Ian Lim
email: mallim_sg@...
homepage: http://www.webappcabaret.com/mallim

From: "Nicholas Lesiecki" <nick@...>
To: <junit@yahoogroups.com>

Subject: RE: [junit] Starter


> yup! Although, to be fair, I did point out the excellent free
documentation
> too. :)
>
> Nick
